creator: Various
description:
LibriVox recording of The Times' Red Cross Story Book By Famous Novelists Serving In His Majesty's Forces by Various.
Read in English by David Wales
These eighteen stories were published in 1915, in the midst of World War I. "Published For The Times' Fund For The Sick And Wounded" - Summary by Book's title page and david wales
For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.
subject: librivox; audiobooks;short stories
title: The Times' Red Cross Story Book By Famous Novelists Serving In His Majesty's Forces
